availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Walter W. Pemberton (Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer and farmhand )

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer and farmhand. Tennessee native. Son of Richard Pemberton, Sr., and Sarah Pemberton. Married to Eliza Jane Martin Pemberton in Union County, Kentucky, on December 24, 1865. Farmer in DeKalb County, Alabama, in 1850. Farmhand in Caldwell County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Alabama, DeKalb County, District 24, p. 408B-409A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Princeton, p. 101.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Union County Marriages, Film #000562206.
